title: Police: Teen found shot to death in Bordeaux
content:
NASHVILLE, TN (WSMV) -
Metro police are investigating after a body was found in Bordeaux on Tuesday.
Police said the body was found in a driveway in the 2500 block of East Lane around 10 a.m. The person who owns the driveway found the body.
The victim has been identified as 16-year-old Ricky Hambrick. Police said he was shot multiple times.
Neighbors said they heard gunshots Monday around 8 p.m. One person told police they saw some run from the scene.
Police are checking surveillance systems nearby to determine if the shooter was captured on video.
Anyone with information about this case is asked to call Crime Stoppers at 615-742-7463.
Stay with Channel 4 and WSMV.com for updates to this story.
